messages.content: He is the ONLY straight talking candidate

keyPolicies.policyDescription: He is the ONLY candidate who is prepared to speak out on the issue of immigration. 'IT'S OUT OF CONTROL'
He is the ONLY candidate that will fight to ensure the survival of our local pubs and businesses.
He is the ONLY candidate that wants to stop the EU spending £45 million a day of our money.
